Stena Glovis can supply tailored solutions for our customers business.

Deep Sea Services

Learn more

Representing the Hyundai Glovis Deep Sea network in Europe and working with all European based shippers, Stena Glovis offers its customers one of the most comprehensive RoRo shipping services in the market.

Ferry Services

Learn more

The Stena Line Freight route network is one of Europe's largest, linking key ports, road and rail connections across northern Europe

Our company delivers different types of cargo

Lengthy Cargo

Learn more about all our cargo capabilities

Learn More

Joint venture

Two of the largest shipping and logistics groups in the world, Hyundai Glovis and Stena, have joined forces with the ambition to become Europe’s leading finished vehicle logistics provider across Deep Sea and Ferry Services.

With a combined PCTC/RoRo fleet trading in European and International waters Stena Glovis will deliver a best in class finished vehicle logistics operation and a unique value proposition to our customers.

Learn more
